Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at Greenwood/78th
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Cottage Grove, 76th, South Chicago and 79th, due to street blockage near Greenwood/78th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Cottage Grove, 76th, South Chicago and 79th, due to street blockage near Greenwood/78th.

Allow extra travel time.
